gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To express an idea or feeling
pomeni pokazati, kaj mislimo ali čutimo, tako da nekaj rečemo ali storimo.

seg.quote: I expressed myself better in French.
That increased confidence expressed itself in other ways.

sense.def:
To express a quantity in a particular form
pomeni zapisati neko količino v določeni obliki.

seg.quote: Here it is expressed as a percentage.
Jefferson had expressly asked her to invite Freeman.

sense.def:
Namen ali cilj, ki je
express
, je pretehtan ali izrecen.

seg.quote: She came with the express purpose of causing trouble.
They bought the house expressly for her.

sense.def:
Pri uslugi, ki je
express
, je delo opravljeno hitreje kot navadno.

An express
je hiter vlak ali avtobus, ki se ustavi le v majhnem številu krajev.
